entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having suspicions and giving information to Harry.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody's magical eye is compared to Dumbledore's ability to see through people.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is being spoken to by Dumbledore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's ascension to power and disappearances are discussed by Dumbledore.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is mentioned as having vanished without a trace.

entities.name: mr. crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is mentioned as having disappeared within the grounds.

entities.name: frank bryce
entities.description: Frank Bryce is mentioned as a Muggle who has disappeared.

relationships.description: Dumbledore speaks to Harry and shares his suspicions.
Voldemort is associated with Bertha Jorkins' disappearance.
Dumbledore mentions Mr. Crouch's disappearance within the grounds.
Voldemort is associated with Frank Bryce's disappearance.
